a-drawer/closable.description: Whether a close (x) button is visible on top right of the Drawer dialog or not.

a-drawer/destroyOnClose.description: Whether to unmount child components on closing drawer or not.

a-drawer/getContainer.description: Return the mounted node for Drawer.

a-drawer/mask.description: Whether to show mask or not.

a-drawer/maskClosable.description: Clicking on the mask (area outside the Drawer) to close the Drawer or not.

a-drawer/visible.description: Whether the Drawer dialog is visible or not.

a-drawer/wrapClassName.description: The class name of the container of the Drawer dialog.

a-drawer/wrapStyle.description: Style of wrapper element which **contains mask** compare to `drawerStyle`

a-drawer/drawerStyle.description: Style of the popup layer element

a-drawer/bodyStyle.description: Style of floating layer, typically used for adjusting its position.

a-drawer/height.description: placement is top or bottom, height of the Drawer dialog.

a-drawer/close.description: Specify a callback that will be called when a user clicks mask, close button or Cancel button.
